replies.bodyText:
That'd be awesome, thanks. I can help with Rust bindings. Here's a relevant thread:
https://internals.rust-lang.org/t/pre-rfc-dealing-with-broken-floating-point/2673
Sounds like different CPUs can produce different results for the same floating operations.  This is going to be a problem for D3log. It also sounds like this should not be an issue for most modern desktops/servers, so maybe this is nothing to worry about.
replies.author: ryzhyk
